definitions.title: cassia
definitions.body: SyrVer Vulgate Targum cf. Di:Ex; √ dub.; perh. foreign word); *— merchan-dise Ez Eze 27:19; ingredient of sacred oil Ex 30:24 (P):—cf. Dioscor.:De Mater. Med. I.12 (Kassi/a=h( kittw/) Theophr:Hist. Paint ix. 5 Plin:NH xii. 19 (42 ff.); v. also Schröd:Ph. Spr. 126 Lewy:Fremdvi. 36.
